name: Dance.
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move left, move right and  jump respectivley.

Space - Jump.

What does one do when all alone at a dance club? Dance.

This game was made for the Weekly Game - Week 122 over the span of about 3 days (I started late).

Theme: One Action

Music by Jakeyboy:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNaj4-OzPvgUnZydYChdUZg?view_as=subscriber

WARNING: Flashing Lights and images
